chart.name: chart.customers.by.country.bar
chart.title: Customers by country
chart.dataset: SELECT count(_partner.id) AS partners, _country.name AS country_name FROM base_partner AS _partner JOIN base_address AS _address ON _address.id = _partner.main_invoicing_address JOIN base_country AS _country ON _country.id = _address.addressL7country WHERE _partner.is_customer = true AND _partner.has_ordered = true GROUP BY _country.name

chart.name: chart.customers.by.industrySector.bar
chart.title: Customers by Industry Sector
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_partner, selection_item.title as _industry_sector FROM base_partner as self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'partner.industry.sectory.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.industry_sector_select and self.is_contact != true and self.is_customer = true AND self.has_ordered = true GROUP BY _industry_sector ORDER BY _industry_sector

chart.name: chart.suppliers.by.country.bar
chart.title: Suppliers by country
chart.dataset: SELECT count(_partner.id) AS partners, _country.name AS country_name FROM base_partner AS _partner JOIN base_address AS _address ON _address.id = _partner.main_invoicing_address JOIN base_country AS _country ON _country.id = _address.addressL7country WHERE _partner.is_supplier = true GROUP BY _country.name

chart.name: chart.partner.prospects.by.country
chart.title: Prospects by country
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(self.id) AS _total_partner, addressCountry.name as _address_country FROM base_partner as self LEFT JOIN base_address as baseAddress ON baseAddress.id=self.main_invoicing_address LEFT JOIN base_country AS addressCountry ON addressCountry.id=baseAddress.addressl7country WHERE self.is_customer = true AND self.has_ordered != true AND is_contact=false GROUP BY _address_country ORDER BY _address_country

chart.name: chart.partner.prospects.by.industrySector
chart.title: Prospects by Industry Sector
chart.dataset: SELECT count(*) as _total_partner, _partnerCategory.name as _industry_sector FROM Partner self LEFT JOIN self.partnerCategory _partnerCategory WHERE self.isCustomer = true AND self.isContact = false group by _partnerCategory.name
